title: Goblin
entryLore: Goblins are small humanoids with distant fey origins. Once servants of the Queen of Air and Darkness, they possess a supernatural knack for finding weak spots in larger foes and a remarkable ability to escape from danger. They are subterranean folk who use their cleverness and agility to survive and thrive in environments where larger creatures would struggle.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have [[advantage|Advantage]] on [[saving_throw|saving throws]] you make to avoid or end the [[charmed_condition|Charmed]] condition.

traits.name: Fury of the Small
traits.description: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your [[proficiency_bonus|Proficiency Bonus]]. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, regaining all uses on a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.description: You can take the [[disengage_action|Disengage]] or [[hide_action|Hide]] action as a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]] on each of your turns.
